nodes.text: The PSNI's drones may not be suitable for use over built-up areas
Professor Noel Sharkey, an expert in the field
said not all drones were suitable for flying over housing estates due to possible malfunctions and danger to the public
in the UK drones are only for very serious crime, terrorist offences or searching for lost children or patrolling borders for illegal emigrants
they've also been used to film lawful protests and to patrol antisocial behaviour in city centres already full of cameras
